sourcesContent:
Search for flights

Airline: {{ flight.airline }}

Remaining Seats: {{ flight.remainingNumberOfSeats }}

Departure: {{ flight.departure.time }} - {{ flight.departure.place }}

Arrival: {{ flight.arrival.time }} - {{ flight.arrival.place }}

Price: ${{ flight.price }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: FlightRm[] = [ { airline: "American Airlines", remainingNumberOfSeats: 500, departure: { time: new Date(Date.now()).toString(), place: "Los Angeles" }, arrival: { time: new Date(Date.now()).toString(), place: "Istanbul" }, price: "350", }, { airline: "Deutsche BA", remainingNumberOfSeats: 60, departure: { time: new Date(Date.now()).toString(), place: "Munchen" }, arrival: { time: new Date(Date.now()).toString(), place: "Schiphol" }, price: "600", }, { airline: "British Airways", remainingNumberOfSeats: 60, departure: { time: new Date(Date.now()).toString(), place: "London, England" }, arrival: { time: new Date(Date.now()).toString(), place: "Vizzola-Ticino" }, price: "600", }, ] constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: string; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
